DocAttribute.Name: InventoryType
DocAttribute.Documentation: A list of the types of inventories from which that required may be selected.

DocAttribute.Name: Jurisdiction
DocAttribute.Documentation: The organizational unit to which the inventory is applicable.

DocAttribute.Name: ResponsiblePersons
DocAttribute.Documentation: Persons who are responsible for the inventory.

DocAttribute.Name: LastUpdateDate
DocAttribute.Documentation: The date on which the last update of the inventory was carried out.

DocAttribute.Name: CurrentValue
DocAttribute.Documentation: An estimate of the current cost value of the inventory.

DocAttribute.Name: OriginalValue
DocAttribute.Documentation: An estimate of the original cost value of the inventory.

DocWhereRule.Name: WR41
DocWhereRule.Documentation: Constrains the type of objects that can be contained within an IfcInventory.
DocWhereRule.Expression: SIZEOF(QUERY(temp <* SELF\IfcGroup.IsGroupedBy.RelatedObjects | NOT( ('IFCPRODUCTEXTENSION.IFCSPACE' IN TYPEOF (temp)) OR ('IFCSHAREDFACILITIESELEMENTS.IFCASSET' IN TYPEOF (temp)) OR ('IFCSHAREDFACILITIESELEMENTS.IFCFURNISHINGELEMENT' IN TYPEOF (temp)) ))) = 0
